recipesJson.name: Nillah Wafers Original Banana Pudding
recipesJson.author: Mathematical
recipesJson.description:
"banana nilla wafer milk" at the moment

will keep tweaking this recipe till its perfect, but I wanted to share "as is" 
3 day steep, still a Work in progress
(not very sweet, add preferred sweetener to taste)

reviews.text: This is a damn fine start to a great banana puddin.  For my own tastes, I might flip-flop the LA and TFA banana, or even look at simply using VT banana custard.
